title: How Orb Energy is breaking financial barriers to solar adoption
description: RE-Invest 2024 began in Gandhinagar, highlighting Orb Energy's efforts to make solar power affordable and accessible. The company has installed over 300 MW of solar systems and launched a 35 MW solar park in Karnataka. Orb Energy's unique vertically integrated approach includes manufacturing, EPC, and in-house financing, making solar energy more accessible for customers.
